DOC.brief_summary: The purpose research study assess efficacy Dysport compare placebo improve muscle tone hemiparetic subject upper limb spasticity due stroke traumatic brain injury .
DOC.criteria: Adult patient post stroke brain injury Modified Ashworth Scale ≥ 2 Ambulatory patient Previous treatment botulinum toxin type within 4 month prior study entry condition Physiotherapy initiate less 4 week inclusion Previous surgery , alcohol , phenol upper limb Neurological/neuromuscular disorder may interfere protocol evaluation
